strIntroduction: Even though Yangon is no longer the capital city of Myanmar, it's still attract a lot of visitors around the world. Follow your professional and English speaking guide and enjoy this amazing city.
strTitle: Yangon classical one day tour

strIntroduction: A convenient transfer service between Yangon airport and the city center.
strTitle: Yangon Airport to Hotels Private 1 Way Transfer

strIntroduction: On this full-day city tour your guide will make sure you get a flavor of the real Mumbai. You’ll see where ordinary people live, learn about their daily routines, visit temples and churches, and explore popular markets. See top historic monuments as well.
strTitle: Mumbai City Tour: 7 Hours by Car

strIntroduction: See Mumbai by foot on a 3-hour heritage walking tour of the city. On this excursion, you will visit major sites of Mumbai, including the Gateway of India, the Prince of Wales Museum, Elphinstone College, Bombay High Court, the Flora Fountain, and more.
strTitle: Heritage 3-Hour Walking Tour of Mumbai

strIntroduction: Explore India’s city of superlatives on a full-day private sightseeing tour of Mumbai. Visit the Gateway of India and the vibrant harbor. Drive down bustling streets, and stop at attractions, such as the Mani Bhawan, and Dhobi Ghat.
strTitle: Mumbai/Bombay - Private Full Day Sightseeing Tour

strIntroduction: Set sail in the backwaters of Kerala on this 4 hour House Boat experience. Enjoy lunch onboard, and listen to the sounds of birds and monkeys playing in the forest.
strTitle: House Boat Kerala: Vembanadu Lake

strIntroduction: Enjoy a full-day tour of Agra, departing from Delhi in the early morning to meet with the sunrise over Taj Mahal.
strTitle: Agra: Taj Mahal Full-Day Sunrise Tour from Delhi

strIntroduction: This full-day tour is the ideal way to discover the vibrant city of Mumbai. You will be escorted around the famous sights of this bustling city in a private air-conditioned car, including the Gateway of India, Dhobi Ghat, Colaba Market and Mani Bhavan.
strTitle: Private Full-Day Sightseeing Tour of Mumbai

strIntroduction: Peek inside the world of Indian cinema on a 4 to 5-hour Bollywood tour of Mumbai, and see legendary movie studios, working film sets, special effects and a special dance show. Visit exclusive areas where Bollywood film stars live, work, and play.
strTitle: Half-Day Bollywood Tour with Dance Show

strIntroduction: Enjoy the visit to world famous museums of Mumbai in this 4 hour walking tour. A private guide ensures the personal attention.
strTitle: Museums of Mumbai: 4 Hours Private Tour

strIntroduction: Discover Mumbai's Jewish heritage on a 2-day tour of the important synagogues in the city and its surrounds. See the buildings linked to the Jewish community, learn about the city's longstanding Jewish history, and visit the Jewish cemetery in Alibaug.
strTitle: Jewish Heritage 2-Day Tour of Mumbai

strIntroduction: This tour takes you from the Ajanta caves, created nearly thousand years after the Nirvana of Lord Buddha to the place where he attained his enlightenment. On this tour you will visit Mumbai,Aurangabad, Bhopal, Agra, Varanasi, Bodhgaya, Delhi, and more!
strTitle: 12 Day Buddhist Pilgrimage Tour of India

strIntroduction: Fly to Delhi from any part of India and transfer to Agra on this full-day sightseeing tour of the Taj Mahal. This 20-hour day includes round-trip transfers by plane and cab and 4-5 hours to marvel at the stunning marble mausoleum, Pearl Mosque, and more.
strTitle: Taj Mahal Day Tour with Same Day Flights from Mumbai

strIntroduction: Explore the fashion capital of India with this comprehensive 10-hour tour of Mumbai's boutiques, showrooms, markets, and factories. Learn about the history and development of Indian fashion and textile production, from its influences to those it inspired.
strTitle: 10-Hour Fashion Tour of Mumbai

strIntroduction: This tour is a combo of the crazy and cool sides of India. The Goa still exhibits the cultural influence of the Portuguese. Relax on beautiful beaches, where as Mumbai is the crazy city of Bollywood.
strTitle: Mumbai & Goa Tour - 7 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Experience what life is like in Mumbai's Dharavi slum on a 3-hour guided walking tour. You’ll see the hidden side of urban India, discover incredible community spirit, and see where the movie “Slumdog Millionaire” was filmed.
strTitle: Mumbai: Private 3-Hour Dharavi Slum Tour

strIntroduction: Visit famous rock cut caves from 200 BC near Mumbai. The Bhaja caves share the same set of architectural designs as Karla caves. Visually, the most impressive monument is the large shrine - chaityagriha - with open, horseshoe-arched entrance.
strTitle: 7-Hour Karla & Bhaja Caves Tour

strIntroduction: Experience Mumbai from the eyes of a local on this half-day tour with a private guide. Visit the most popular sights and experience the best parts of the city, with the flexibility of a specialized itinerary, planned based on your own personal interests.
strTitle: Mumbai: Private Half-Day City Highlights Tour

strIntroduction: Get a fascinating look at 2 different aspects of life in Mumbai on this full-day tour. Walk through the streets of Dharavi to witness a hidden side of urban India. Then go behind the scenes of Bollywood with an on-set visit during the filming of a movie.
strTitle: Bollywood tour with Slum Tour

strIntroduction: Explore Mumbai's busiest bazaars on this day tour. Learn about the ancient Indian city as you make your way through bustling street markets, and admire the vibrancy of the people who sell their wares in packed bazaars to people from all over the world.
strTitle: Mumbai Bazaar Full-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Walk through Mumbai's chaotic streets with a local guide and learn about India's street food culture. Experience the dizzy pace of daily life as you snack on Mumbai burgers, sweet Chai and other tasty morsels from the street stalls.
strTitle: Mumbai Street Food Tour: 5-Hours

strIntroduction: See a more serene side to India on a 3-day tour from Mumbai to a farm village 4 hours away. Relax at a lovely village farm, enjoy delicious meals, and get to know the locals as you go off the beaten path to visit sugar mills and talk with the farmers.
strTitle: Indian Village 3-Day Tour from Mumbai

strIntroduction: Mumbai has a long tradition of making movies within the Hindi film industry and this tour explores the Bollywood world to give you a better perspective of the history, creativity and technical aspects of this acclaimed cultural attraction.
strTitle: Full-Day Bollywood Tour of Mumbai with Dance Show

strIntroduction: Jodhpur – Established in 1459, Jodhpur a must-see destination of Rajasthan in India.
strTitle: Jodhpur City Tour

strIntroduction: This tour is perfect for those who have enough time to spend in Mumbai. During this tour you will get a chance to see Mumbai completely. We will take you to the finest sightseeing spots, markets and of course Bollywood studio.
strTitle: 3-Day Mumbai Tour with Visit of Bollywood Studio

strIntroduction: Explore Mumbai at night as you discover the only city in India that is truly 24/7. Take a city tour, visit bars and nightclubs, and enjoy a midnight buffet.
strTitle: Mumbai by Night: City tour, Night Club, and Dinner

strIntroduction: This tour provides at a visit to the Global Pagoda a monument to serve Peace & Harmony.The Global Vipassana Pagoda is built out of gratitude to the Buddha, his teaching and the community of monks practicing his teaching.
strTitle: Mumbai Temples and Caves Day Tour

strIntroduction: Bangalore is an amazing tourist destination of India. It has magnificently elegant parks, adorned with a tangle of flowering trees.
strTitle: Bangalore City Tour

strIntroduction: Elephanta Island was a powerful capital of coastal kingdom and today stands as magnificent relic rich in sculptural delights.This day-tour led by an expert guide is not to missed when visiting Mumbai.
strTitle: Elephanta Caves Guided Tour from Mumbai

strIntroduction: Take a 3-hour Mumbai Food tour with qualified and experienced Indian tour guides who are College and University Students. You will try delicious Indian dishes at local restaurants.
strTitle: Mumbai Food tour

strIntroduction: Experience the energetic nightlife of Mumbai – India’s 24-hour city of fun and entertainment. This evening tour takes you to a bar, a night club, and a restaurant on a discovery of the city’s vibrant nightlife.
strTitle: Mumbai by Night - Bollywood Nightlife Tour

strIntroduction: Discover Mumbai by night on this delicious and fun-filled tour. Mumbai stays awake long after the rest of India has gone to bed, so no matter what time of night you venture out, you are bound to find some fun.
strTitle: Discover Mumbai by Night - Nightclub and Sightseeing

strIntroduction: Visit to Mumbai is not completed until you have tasted the finger-licking Chowpatty food. Enjoy the great taste of Pav Bhaji, Masala Dosa, Panipuri, Kulfi and much more. A private guide ensures to provide proper attention, information and safety.
strTitle: Mumbai: Private Tour of Chowpatty with Dinner

strIntroduction: Get a fascinating look at slum life in Mumbai on this three-hour walking tour. Make your way through the streets of Dharavi to witness a hidden side of urban India and get a new perspective on city life in one of India's, and the world's, largest cities.
strTitle: Dharavi Slum Group Tour in Mumbai

strIntroduction: Enjoy a 1hour massage based on centuries-old Ayurvedic therapies. Ayurvedic therapy is an ancient science focusing on establishing and maintaining the balance of energies within the body.
strTitle: Mumbai Ayurvedic Massage

strIntroduction: A tour of the major attractions of India’s Golden Triangle is the perfect introduction to the county for first-time visitors. You’ll see the highlights of Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. Marvel at the Taj Mahal, the Pink City, the Amber Fort, and much more!
strTitle: Delhi, Agra, Jaipur: 3-Day Golden Triangle Tour

strIntroduction: Leave behind the chaos of Mumbai and encounter the traditional communities within the tribal villages of Chinchoti, Charndra, and Pada. Travel by air-conditioned vehicle and enjoy the expertise of your local guide on this full-day tour.
strTitle: Old India Tribal Village Full-Day Tour from Mumbai

strIntroduction: Island Peak, 6183m, also known as Imja Tse is one of the most popular trekking peaks in Nepal for climbing on Himalayas.
strTitle: Island Peak Climbing 6183m

strIntroduction: Experience the varieties of programs like Trekking, Jungle Safari, and Rafting with city tour in Nepal.
strTitle: Explore The Nepal

strIntroduction: Drive by 4x4 to see the lush farm land, Visit Wadi Al Abyadh & much More..
strTitle: Wadi Al Abyadh Tour (by 4X4)

strIntroduction: See Jebel Akhdar,‘green mountain’, Saiq Plateau and much more.. (Available Languages: English,German,Spanish,Italian,French,Portuguese)
strTitle: Jebel Akhdar Tour

strIntroduction: Visit Nizwa's Major attractions like 17th Century fort, Bahla and much more! You will attracted by this amazing ancient city for sure!
strTitle: Nizwa Full Day Tour

strIntroduction: The coast of Oman is blessed with a variety of dolphins & whales, about 21 different species of whales & dolphins have been identified along the oman
strTitle: Dolphin Cruise

strIntroduction: 10-15mins Helicopter tour discovering Jumeirah Beach, Jumeirah Palm and other landmarks from an eagle's eye.
strTitle: Helicopter Tour

strIntroduction: Do a thrilling flight that stimulates the imagination. Hot-air balloon rides are adventure, in a low-tech craft that is at the whims of wind & nature
strTitle: Balloon Flight

strIntroduction: Discover the magnificence of the jewel in Abi Dhabi's crown – Emirates Palace – with a buffet meal in the Le Vendome restaurant!
strTitle: Le Vendome Restaurant Dining at Emirates Palace

strIntroduction: Drive by 4X4 to your five stars desert camp enjoy deserts actives and also the great oriental night with the belly dancer, BBQ dinner and much more
strTitle: Abu Dhabi Overnight Safari

strIntroduction: Dive into the snowy fun of Dubai Snow Park with this all-day Ski Dubai Super Pass. Enjoy the fantastic rides and much more.
strTitle: Ski Dubai Ticket (Super pass)

strIntroduction: Discover the highlights of Dubai on this full-day tour. See the tallest building in the world, enjoy a ride onboard a traditional water taxi, admire the Dubai Marina, and stroll through the impressive Dubai Mall.
strTitle: Dubai Tour & Burj Khalifa

strIntroduction: Have a wonderful journey in Ferrari World Abu Dhabi which is a heaven for the Ferrari and sports cars lovers.
strTitle: Entrance ticket to Ferrari World Abu Dhabi

strIntroduction: Experience the taste of Traditional Arabic dine at the heart of the world’s tallest atrium and awe-inspiring surroundings.
strTitle: Dinning at Al Iwan Restaurant Burj Al Arab

strIntroduction: Experience dining at Atmosphere restaurant in Burj Khalifa at the height of 442 meters with a dramatic view of Dubai downtown and fountains.
strTitle: Atmosphere Restaurant Dinning at Burj Khalifa

strIntroduction: Explore the flora and fauna of Dubai on a 4-hour tour of Butterfly Garden and Miracle Garden. See more than 45 million flowers in bloom at Miracle Garden, and wander the round 3D garden of Butterfly Garden to see species of butterfly.
strTitle: Flora and Fauna Tour

strIntroduction: A dhow trip in to fjords of Musandam offers an insight into this fantastic landscape, ambiance of peace and tranquility.
strTitle: Musandam Sea Safari

strIntroduction: A Seaplane flight of 25 Min. See the Emirates Palace, Yas Island, Saadiyat Island on board the Seawings seaplane
strTitle: Seaplane Tour

strIntroduction: Experience Dubai modern Architecture & "Burj Khalifah" world's tallest tower! Discover the beauty of this modern city of United Arab Emirates!
strTitle: Dubai Modern City Tour

strIntroduction: Cruise in a traditional boat. Abu Dhabi harbour dinner cruise seamlessly combines discovery, relaxation comfort.
strTitle: Dhow Cruise Dinner

strIntroduction: Enjoy a day of adrenaline thrills with a full-day combined ticket to 2 of Dubai's best water attractions. Skip the lines to the Aquaventure Waterpark, and discover more than 15,000 marine creatures from around the world at the Lost Chambers Aquarium.
strTitle: Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark Lost Chamber combo

strIntroduction: Book our private, low-cost transfer from your hotel to Abu Dhabi International Airport - quick and convenient with luggage included.
strTitle: Arrival / Departure Transfer to Abu Dhabi Airport

strIntroduction: Travel across the desert in a 4x4 vehicle. Photo stops in a dune drive a desert sunset, dune bashing, henne experience, sand boarding and many more.
strTitle: 4x4 Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner - Standard

strIntroduction: Revel in the most beautiful city in the world as you have never seen it before, with a tour of Paris with a difference. Marvel at the splendor of Paris, from strolling through refined boulevards of luxury to exploring hidden gems and enclaves which are known only to locals. This tour gives a true local’s insight into the day-to-day beauty of Paris as well as the world-famous landmarks.
strTitle: Secret Paris: Cheese, Art, and Local Life

strIntroduction: Chef Marthe, passed from the restaurant to the home kitchen, transmits her excellent recipes in funny and informative classes.
strTitle: Cooking class with Chef Marthe

strIntroduction:
Learn how to taste and identify wine on a fun and informative wine tasting experience of French wines in Paris!
You will take a virtual trip through the wine regions of France, sampling the goods in the company of an expert sommelier.
strTitle: Wine and Cheese Tasting

strIntroduction: Enjoy one full day within the Versailles Palace! The Versailles castle is part of the French historical heritage. It is the finest and most complete monument of 17th century architecture. You could all day long appreciate the beauty of the palace during a full day visit and then going for a walk in the gardens and Marie-Antoinette's estate with the mini train.
strTitle: Versailles Visit with Audioguide (Transport Included)

strIntroduction: Discover the city of Nice and enjoy its fantastic and unique views from our open top deck buses ! Valid for one day on the tour route, allows you to hop on and hop off as often as you please.
strTitle: Nice 1 Day Pass Hop on Hop off

strIntroduction: Discover the rocky island that is Mont Saint-Michel, nestled in the largest bay in Europe
strTitle: Visit Mont Saint-Michel from Paris

strIntroduction: Discover the beauty of Paris after dark on a guided bike tour that takes you to see the illuminated monuments and landmarks of the City.
strTitle: Paris By Night：3-Hour Guided Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Join this unique 2-hour perfume workshop in the beautiful city
strTitle: Paris: Perfume Workshop

strIntroduction: The Opera Garnier is one of the most extravagant representations of Second Empire architecture in France, you'll discover Paris’ secrets in this walking tour of Opera Garnier!
strTitle: Opera Garnier tour

strIntroduction: Visit Paris monuments and museums as much as you like!
strTitle: Paris Museum Pass

strIntroduction: Enjoy a nice day trip from Paris to the majestic Domaine de Chantilly, extending over 19 000 acres, in one of the biggest forest of Paris outskirts.
strTitle: 1 Day trip to the Château de Chantilly

strIntroduction: Book your airport transfer from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport to your centrally located Paris hotel (postcode beginning with 75 only) !
strTitle: Paris Shared Airport Transfer to/from CDG / Orly Airport

strIntroduction: 衆多小鎮美景一次滿足！專業包車帶給你更多私人空間，與家人朋友共賞普羅旺斯之美。

strIntroduction: Put your best foot forward and discover one of Paris’ landmark attractions, the Louvre Museum during the grand Louvre Museum Walking Tour.
strTitle: Guided tour of the Louvre Museum - Skip the Line

strIntroduction: 一日游玩尽普罗旺斯最精华的特色，普罗旺斯风情小镇，薰衣草，圣十字湖。
strTitle: 【走进南法】普罗旺斯之心半自助游一日游（中巴 - 大巴）

strIntroduction: Skip the long lines for taxis, or the hassle of navigating public transport upon arrival at Airport, and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a stylish, comfortable vehicle!
strTitle: Paris Private Airport Transfer to/from CDG / Orly Airport

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: Discover the extraordinary history of the catacombs and listen to the haunting stories and legends of these galleries of skeletons !
strTitle: Skip the Line: Catacombs of Paris Small-Group Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Follow the kings, queens and nobility into the heart of France with this full-day tour of the Loire Valley. With visits to Châteaux Chambord, Chenonceau, and Cheverny, you will be swept off your feet by the finest sights of the French Renaissance.
strTitle: From Paris: Full-Day Loire Valley Chateaux Tour

strIntroduction: The Montmartre Walk explores the rich artistic history of this area of Paris.
strTitle: Montmartre Walking Tour

strIntroduction: A night to remember is on the cards at the famous Moulin Rouge theatre!
strTitle: Moulin Rouge show with pick up from Hotel

strIntroduction: This 2-hour walking tour of Paris uncovers gruesome secrets from the city’s dark past.
strTitle: Paris Walking Tour：Dark Heart and Murder Mysteries

strIntroduction: Join the French Revolution Paris Walking Tour.
strTitle: Paris Walking Tour - The French Revolution

strIntroduction: Live like an Impressionist on a visit to Giverny.
strTitle: Giverny - Monet at home

strIntroduction:
這是你第一次來到巴黎嗎？
或是你對巴黎情有獨鍾，想再會見這神秘莫測的情人？
4小時的時間認識城市的風情歷史
享受艾菲爾鐵塔上的午餐
與塞納河畔的幽美風情
用這趟巴士之旅載你走遍花都的迷人景致
strTitle: 【人氣地標】一次暢遊巴黎＋巴黎鐵塔門票＋塞納河浪漫遊船

strIntroduction: Observe the magic of Paris with a panoramic view of the city on the 2nd floor of the Eiffel Tower!
strTitle: Eiffel Tower visit with Seine cruise and Paris night tour

strIntroduction: Pure chocolate equals pure pleasure.
strTitle: Pure Chocolate Walk on Paris' Right Bank

strIntroduction: Choose the option that suits your needs the best. Paris Pass is only valid for consecutive days of use.
strTitle: Paris CityPass

strIntroduction: Their colors are in all Parisian pastry shops. Trendy and irresistibly delicious, often chosen as a gift, you can eat them at any time!
strTitle: Cooking class with Chef Frédéric: Macarons !
Marseille Shore Excursion: Private Tour of Aix-en-Provence and Cassis

strIntroduction:
See the sights of Paris on a unique 2.5-hour food tour, traveling by restaurant style gourmet bus.
Enjoy fine French cuisine aboard a double-decker bus and take in awe-inspiring views of the city’s monuments, such as the Arc de Triomphe and Eiffel Tower.
strTitle: Paris Food Tour: Bustronomy Gourmet Tour of Paris

strIntroduction: Visit all the major sites including Champs Elysees, the Opera House, River Seine and Eiffel Tower. Enjoy the feast on the Eiffel Tower and romantic cruise on the River Seine. In the end, appreciate fabulous arts in the Louvre.
strTitle: Luxury escorted Paris Day Trip - with TOUR OF LE LOUVRE. Plus Champagne lunch on the Eiffel Tower.

strIntroduction: From the Louvre Museum to the Cathedral Notre-Dame, passing by the Eiffel Tower, discover Paris the time of a cruise on our boats along the Seine.
strTitle: 【KKday Special Price】Seine Cruises

strIntroduction: Discover Paris at your leisure with our great value Paris three day break. See Musee D'Orsay, Place de la concorde and Notre Dame during the cruise on River Seine. Enjoy a a Champagne lunch on the Eiffel tower！
strTitle: Explore Paris - 3 day break with lunch on the Eiffel tower

strIntroduction: Step into the wondrous world of Disney
strTitle: Disneyland Paris: 1 Day 2 Parks with Transport

strIntroduction: Be swept along through the city sights with a one hour cruise along the River Seine.
strTitle: Lunch Cruise "Orsay Menu" - La Marina

strIntroduction: Step back in time with a tour to Bruges, one of the best preserved medieval towns in Europe.
strTitle: 1 Day in Bruges from Paris

strIntroduction: This three-day pass allows you to discover Paris by Open Tour bus and Batobus boat at your own pace. Your unlimited three-day pass gives you the freedom to discover Paris and enjoy commentary about Paris's key monuments.
strTitle: 3 Day Hop on Hop off Bus and Boat Pass

strIntroduction: Spend a delightful day exploring the towns of the French Riviera and the Provençal countryside on a private tour from Nice. Cruise down the iconic Boulevard de la Croisette and see the Film Festival Palace in Cannes, and tour a perfumery in sweet-smelling Grasse. Drive through the gorgeous Loup Gorges and take in sweeping views of the Alps and the Mediterranean from medieval Gourdon. Finally, stroll through the picturesque lanes of artsy Saint-Paul-de-Vence. Enjoy a leisurely pace and the personalized attention of your private guide.
strTitle: Countryside Private Day Trip

strIntroduction: This fantastic half day excursion (morning or afternoon) gives you an opportunity to discover Paris's famous tourist sights and monuments. It includes lunch at the restaurant on the 1st floor of the Eiffel Tower, a city tour by panoramic coach, and an hour-long cruise along the Seine. Experience the beauty and heritage of the French capital in three different ways.
strTitle: Tour of Paris, Seine Cruise, and Lunch at the Eiffel Tower
